    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String newPassword, String id)
      This method is utilized by the profile controller to change the password of the current user. It creates a UPDATE SQL query and uses the users UUID as the where clause.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - a new password inputted by the user
      id - The users UUID taken from the User class
      Returns:
      boolean dependent on a successful update

    • chanegUserInfo

      public boolean chanegUserInfo(String id, String firstname, String lastname, String email)
      This method is ultilzed by the profile controller to change the personal info of a current user. An UPDATE SQL query is created and changes the firstName, lastName and email of a user according to the users UUID.
      Parameters:
      id - The current users UUID
      firstname - The new first name of the user
      lastname - The new last name of the user
      email - The new email of the user
      Returns:
      boolean according to the success of the update

    • getUserProjects

      public List<Project> getUserProjects(String userId)
      Retrieves all projects associated with a specific user
      Parameters:
      userId - String ID of the user whose projects to retrieve
      Returns:
      List of Project objects

    • createProject

      public boolean createProject(Project project)
      Creates a new project in the database
      Parameters:
      project - Project to create
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • updateProject

      public boolean updateProject(Project project)
      Updates an existing project in the database
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(String projectId)
      Deletes a project from the database
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project to delete
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • getProjectById

      public Project getProjectById(String projectId)
      Retrieves a project by its ID
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Project object if found, null otherwise
